snippet.title: Natchez to Hushpukena: Tom Waits lyrics plotted on interactive map
snippet.description: It's Tom Waits' world. We just happen to be living in it. An online map pinpoints his song lyric locations all across the globe.

snippet.title: Music publishers fire DMCA take-down notices at top lyrics sites
snippet.description: The National Music Publishers' Association sent DMCA take-down notices to the biggest Web sites seeming to profit from posting unlicensed lyrics.

snippet.title: View lyrics for YouTube videos without looking them up
snippet.description: Frequent YouTube music video watcher? This extension will help you learn the lyrics so you can sing it like a pro later.

snippet.title: No potty-mouth lyrics for iTunes Match
snippet.description: A glitch is causing iTunes Match to scrub explicit lyrics from some rap songs. Apple is working to fix the issue.

snippet.title: Shazam Player serves up song lyrics in style
snippet.description: Want to learn the words to your favorite song? Or sing along, karaoke-style? This free iOS app turns lyrics into a visual feast.

snippet.title: Ep. 184: Insert lyrics here
snippet.description: This week, Donald and Jasmine discuss a monumental smackdown between the Beats Solo by Dr. Dre and the Bose On-Ear Headphones. OK, maybe not quite monumental, but certainly interesting. Of course, if you think we're going to reveal the outcome without making you suffer through all three judges' rantings on the matter, you're sorely mistaken. Also on tap for this week: Cowon trots out a new video player, V-Moda makes an appearance with some new iPhone-friendly headphones, and Real takes a huge, industry-changing beating from the MPAAholes. Plus, what exactly do the MP3 Insiders think about keeping all our media in the cloud? Tune in to find out.

snippet.title: Get lyrics to all of your favorite songs
snippet.description: Want to follow the lyrics to your favorite songs without being distracted from your normal browsing? With MiniLyrics, you can read along as your music plays in any player, and Veronica has all the details on today's Tekzilla Daily.

snippet.title: Will.i.am forgets lyrics, reads them from cell phone?
snippet.description: In what appears to be a musically incriminating video, the Black Eyed Peas singer uses his cell phone in order to read the lyrics to one of his own songs. Or does he?

snippet.title: Unpatched Java hole exploited at lyrics site
snippet.description: Researchers say vendor should issue a patch for the flaw in Java Web Start before more attacks come.

snippet.title: MP3 Insider 184: Insert lyrics here (podcast)
snippet.description: This week, Donald and Jasmine discuss a monumental smackdown between the Beats Solo by Dr. Dre and the Bose On-Ear Headphones. OK, maybe not quite monumental, but certainly interesting.
